comment.author: 77210015@N02
comment._content: baalbeck is in Lebanon, not in Syria.

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content:
Thanks for bringing this to our attention. We transcribe the captions directly from the old lantern slides, so sometimes the information is a bit (!) outdated. In this case, the "Syria" designation dates from around 1900, before Lebanon became an independent country in 1943. Working on fixing all 12 images of Ballbek!
Deb Wythe
Brooklyn Museum Digital Lab
